item.description:
Casey Danek will be coming to give Seven Hills Camera Club his Project 52 program on Monday, April 25 at 7:15 PM at the Holden Light Dept., 1 Holden St., Holden MA 01520.

PROJECT 52

A self inflicted commitment to perform an act of creativity once a week for a full year, and include a blow-by-blow report each week in a blog.
Inspired by friends and family who participated in Thing A Day during February 2010 (http://thing-a-day.com/), I decided to take a less strenuous route. By pacing myself through a weekly challenge instead of daily, even for 52 weeks, I was pretty sure I could come up with a worthwhile "something" in the arts each time. My focus was photography, music, prose, and poetry. This presentation will cover my adventure, lessons learned, high and low points. I will include a short slide show (about 13 minutes) and then answer questions.
My Project 52 website is...

rcdanek.us/project52
item.how_to_find_us: Down stairs in the meeting room off the parking lot-more parking available at the church as well...
item.why: If you have ever considered doing a photo a day or a photo a week projects this lecture is for you...

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Casey Danek Discusses Project 52
